title: Im pissed
body: I was loading in a game and something went wrong and had to reconnect like when minions barely spawned and the game did a remake after i already reconnected and lost my lp im pissed i was already in game and laning hasn't even started, i want my lp back!

replies.body:
I'm sorry to say that we are **unable** to reimburse your LP or change your match history in any capacity. The system was designed this way to prevent any sort of corruption. The /Remake system marks anyone who is *Inactive* for 90+ seconds within the first 3 minutes of a match and will become available at 3:00 if anyone was marked. I recommend checking out our [Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more details on the system.

I understand technical issues can be really frustrating when they cause you to lose progress you've made in reaching your ranked goals. If you have another issue with this or would like to take proactive steps to prevent this, please let me know more details regarding what error message or behavior you saw when this occurred.

Let me know if you have any questions.
